code:
<!DOCTYPE html>

<head>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

  <!-- Automatically handle auth callback using Magic! -->

  <script
    src="https://auth.magic.link/pnp/callback"
    data-magic-publishable-api-key="pk_live_EA83789AA268312E">
  </script>

  <!-- Use data from Magic! -->

  <script>
    window.addEventListener('@magic/ready', (e) => {
      const { idToken, userMetadata, oauth } = e.detail;

      const idTokenEl = document.getElementById('idToken');
      const userMetadataEl = document.getElementById('userMetadata');
      const oauthEl = document.getElementById('oauth');

      idTokenEl.innerText = JSON.stringify(idToken, null, 2);
      userMetadataEl.innerText = JSON.stringify(userMetadata, null, 2);
      oauthEl.innerText = JSON.stringify(oauth, null, 2);
    });
  </script>


  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/main.css">
</head>

<!-- UI implementation -->

<body>
  <div class="page">
    <div class="data">
      <label>window.Magic.user.getIdToken()</label>
explanation:
**Purpose:** Authenticates users with Magic Auth and displays user data.

**Functionality:**

1. Loads the Magic Auth callback script.
2. Waits for authentication completion using `@magic/ready` event.
3. Retrieves ID token, user metadata, and OAuth details from Magic Auth.
4. Displays these values in HTML elements on the page (idTokenEl, userMetadataEl, oauthEl).

**Note:** This block assumes an existing Magic Auth setup with a publishable API key.

file_summary:
Here is a concise summary of `callback.html`:

**Callback HTML:**

Authenticates users with Magic Auth, displays user data, and provides a logout link in a dashboard layout.

code:
Loading...
Loading...
Loading...
Logout
explanation:
This block displays a dashboard with four sections:

1. Token loading status
2. User metadata (displayed after login)
3. OAuth redirect result (displayed after login)
4. Logout link

All sections initially display "Loading...", indicating that data is being fetched or processed.

code:
<head>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />

  <!-- Start the login flow just by including this script tag! -->
  <script
    src="https://auth.magic.link/pnp/login"
    data-magic-publishable-api-key="pk_live_EA83789AA268312E"
    data-redirect-uri="/callback.html"
  ></script>
</head>
explanation: This block is a HTML head section that includes a script tag from Magic Link, a login service provider, to initiate a login flow with a redirect to "/callback.html" after authentication.

code:
<!DOCTYPE html>

<head>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

  <!-- Automatically handle logout using Magic! -->

  <script
    src="https://auth.magic.link/pnp/logout"
    data-magic-publishable-api-key="pk_live_EA83789AA268312E"
    data-redirect-uri="/">
  </script>
</head>
explanation: This block is a HTML snippet that includes a script from Magic, an authentication service. It automatically handles user logout by redirecting them to the website's root page (/) upon clicking logout.
